element.name: LOCK RIFLE
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 2 damage and 1 mark to 1 target you can see.
element.info_second_effect: Deal 1 mark to a different target you can see.

element.name: MACHINE GUN
element.info_basic_effect: Choose 1 or 2 targets you can see and deal 1 damage to each
element.info_second_effect: Deal 1 additional damage to one of those targets.
element.info_third_effect: Deal 1 additional damage to the other of those targets and/or deal 1 damage to a different target you can see.

element.name: T.H.O.R.
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see
element.info_second_effect: Deal 1 damage to a second target that your first target can see.
element.info_third_effect: Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see. You cannot use this effect unless you first use the second effect.

element.name: PLASMA GUN
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see
element.info_second_effect: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect.
element.info_third_effect: Deal 1 additional damage to your target.

element.name: WHISPER
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 3 damage and 1 mark to 1 target you can see.Your target must be at least 2 moves away from you.

element.name: ELECTROSCYTHE
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 1 damage to every other player on your square
element.info_second_effect: Deal 2 damage to every other player on your square.

element.name: TRACTOR BEAM
element.info_basic_effect: Move a target 0,1 or 2 squares to a square you can see, and give it 1 damage
element.info_second_effect: Choose a target 0, 1, or 2 moves away from you. Move the target to your square and deal 3 damage to it.

element.name: VORTEX CANNON
element.info_basic_effect: Choose a square you can see, but not your square.Call it the vortex. Choose a target on the vortex or 1 move away from it.Move it onto the vortex and give it 2 damage
element.info_second_effect: Choose up to 2 other targets on the vortex or 1 move away from it. Move them onto the vortex and give them each 1 damage.

element.name: FURNACE
element.info_basic_effect: Choose a room you can see, but not the room you are in.Deal 1 damage to every
element.info_second_effect: Choose a square exactly one move away. Deal 1 damage and 1 mark to everyone on that square.

element.name: HEATSEEKER
element.info_basic_effect: Choose 1 target you cannot see and deal 3 damage to it. Notes: Yes,this can only hit targets you cannot see.

element.name: HELLION
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away.Then give 1 mark to that target and everyone else on that square.
element.info_second_effect: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away. Then give 2 marks to that target and everyone else on that square.

element.name: FLAMETRHOWER
element.info_basic_effect: Choose a square 1 move away and possibly a second square 1 more move away in the same direction.On each square, you may choose 1 target and give it 1 damage.
element.info_second_effect:
Choose 2 squares as above. Deal 2 damage to
everyone on the first square and 1 damage to everyone on the second
square.

element.name: GRENADE LAUNCHER
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see.Then you may move the target 1 square.
element.info_second_effect:
Deal 1 damage to every player on a square you can
see. You can use this before or after the basic effect's move.

element.name: ROCKET LAUNCHER
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see that is not on your square.Then you may move the target 1 square.

element.name: RAILGUN
element.info_basic_effect: Choose a cardinal direction and 1 target in that direction.Deal 3 damage to it.

element.name: CYBERBLADE
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

element.name: ZX-2
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 1 damage and 2 marks to 1 target you can see.

element.name: SHOTGUN
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your square.If you want, you may then move the target 1 square.

element.name: POWER GLOVE
element.info_basic_effect: Choose 1 target on any square exactly 1 move away.Move onto that square and give the target 1 damage and 2 marks.

element.name: SHOCKWAVE
element.info_basic_effect: Choose up to 3 targets on different squares, each exactly 1 move away.Deal 1 damage to each target.

element.name: SLEDGEHAMMER
element.info_basic_effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.

element.name: TARGETING SCOPE
element.info_card_effect: You may play this card when yiu are dealing damage to one or more targets.Pay 1 ammo cube of any color.Choose 1 of those targets and give it an extra point of damage.Note: You cannot use this to do 1 damage to a target that is receiving only marks.

element.name: NEWTON
element.info_card_effect: You may play this card on your turn before or after any action.Choose any other player's figure and move it 1 or 2 squares in one direction.(You can't use this to move a figure after it respawns at the end of your turn.That would be too late.)

element.name: TAGBACK GRENADE
element.info_card_effect: You may play this card when you receive damage from a player you can see.Give that player 1 mark.

element.name: TELEPORTER
element.info_card_effect: You may play this card on your turn before or after any action.Pick up your figure and set it down of any square of the board.(You can't use this after you see where someone respawns at the end of your turn.By then it is too late.)
